评论详情: Let me preface, I am a slipper hoarder! I have a vast collection of styles, and colors. I purchased the 3 Bohemia. HANDS DOWN, these are my most favorite pair! The fit, the comfort, the pattern....chef's kiss! They are super affordable but I was able to buy during a sale so, BONUS! I immediately ordered another pair of a different pattern because I was afraid I would wear the other's out. I didn't like the 2nd pair quite as much only because they were a fluffier material and looked like slippers so I couldn't wear them in public as easily. Lol. But they are just as comfortable as the others!! I'd love to get another pair. I WILL get another pair. Listen, YOU NEED THESE. Especially if you like comfy, cute, happy feet.

评论概述: VERY comfortable, actually non slip. Perfect house slippers.
评论详情: I like these so much better than I thought I would. I wear them over socks around the house when its cold and w/o when its warm and they fit fine either way. The grip on the bottom is actually non slip and as a natural born klutz I really need that feature. Lightweight, comfortable, highly recommend.  The ONLY thing I didn't like is they didn't "match" pattern. But I realize that is going to bother me more than most.
They are warm and comfortable
My husband loves his new house slippers and the rubber bottoms.
I got these slippers for my mom ad a Christmas gift! She LOVES them and wears them everywhere around the house. I will be getting myself a pair!

I found these to be comfortable flexible and although I don’t have a wide foot, the slipper is wide at the toe. The only thing I didn’t like was the back pushing my toes forward into the slipper. I folded it down and now I use them like a Slip on.

These slippers are warm and cozy. Great for wearing around the house. I had to return the first pair and go up a size. My shoe size is 7-1/2 in a sandal, an 8 or 8-1/2 in an enclosed shoe. I needed the one marked 9-1/2-10. They run short in the length. They are shipped with minimal packaging, in a vacuum-sealed bag inside a shipping envelope. The slippers were flat as a fritter when first taken out of the package, no shape whatsoever. They were perfectly fine once I wore them a bit and hold their shape just fine.

Pro: I LOVE these slippers. Soft walk, flexible sole, doesn't make clunking sounds while everyone else is sleeping, soft and cozy!  Con: I would recommend that they alter the pattern to sew the ankle seam a little further back (about 1/2 inch) so it doesn't uncomfortably and unnaturally push your toes to the front seam. See heel in photo.

Nice house slipper, non slip bottom, appears to be well made, hugs your foot.  Although I’ve yet to wash them they should hold up nicely on delicate and line/air dry.  Nicer than another pair I recently bought from an expensive mail order brand.

Bought these in 2 colors. Cute, cozy, roomy/not tight fitting and really like that they have a rubber sole like a shoe. Keeping one pair reserved for use when visiting family or friends. Easy to roll up and toss in a purse or pocket.
They are comfy but crunch the toes a bit.  Order a half size larger.
